cardDescription: The Bitshares blockchain has 3 second block times and is capable of handling thousands of transactions per second, This page provides a live overview of the blockchain.

currentWitness.content: The witness who produced the most recent block.

tps.content: Transactions per second over the last {{blockQty}} blocks.

uniqueWitnesses.content: Number of unique witnesses in the recent blocks.

txPerBlock.content: Average number of transactions per block over the last {{blockQty}} blocks.

recentFees.content: Total fees collected in the last {{blockQty}} blocks.

chart.content: Displaying the number of transactions per block over the last {{blockQty}} blocks.

dialogContent.jsonDescription: Detailed JSON data of the selected item.
